dct_title_s: A new & accurate map of Persia : with the adjacent countries. Drawn from the most approved modern maps &c. The whole being regulated by astronl. observations
dct_description_sm: Numbered "N⁰. 36." Decorative title cartouche with figures. Shows boundaries, rivers, roads, forests and principal settlements. Relief shown pictorially. London meridian.
